attributes.additional_details: Joseph Kony, a guerilla leader in central Africa, is the International Criminal Court's number 1 most wanted. He has forced an estimated 66,000 children into his army, forcing them to conduct atrocities and has pushed 2,000,000 people out of their homes. This has to stop. International pressure is the only way the end this awful crime against humanity and the UK needs to step up and do its part.
